title: Zodiac
description: At the dawn of time, there were 13 Houses in the Zodiac Galaxy. Now only 12 remain....This first book off an epic sci-fi-meets-high-fantasy series takes place in a galaxy inspired by the twelve astrological signs. ZODIAC is rendered with a stunning complexity that both transports readers to a fascinating new world and holds up a mirror to reflect how we can better know each other in our own.
author: Romina Russell
